Comment: In his memo, Trump said ActBlue detected at least 22 “significant fraud campaigns” in recent years, around half of which originated abroad. He also noted that in a 30-day period in the 2020 election the platform detected 237 donations from foreign IP addresses using prepaid cards.  The president left out the fact that ActBlue took actions in response to those detections. It caught and rejected fraudulent donations made through the fraud campaigns and banned contributions made from foreign IP addresses using domestic prepaid cards, according to House Republicans.  Lying by omission is still lying, Donnie.
Author: TheHoundofUlster
